00019 #include <qhbox.h>
00020 #include <qlabel.h>
00021 #include <qpixmap.h>
00022 #include <qcursor.h>
00023 
00024 #include "config.h"
00025 #include "globalGoBackLabel.h"
00026 
00027 GlobalGoBackLabel::GlobalGoBackLabel(QWidget *parent, const char *name)
00028     : QHBox(parent,name)
00029 {
00030     icon = new QLabel(this);
00031     icon->setPixmap( QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/back.png") );
00032     label = new QLabel(" Back (ESC)", this);
00033     setCursor(Qt::PointingHandCursor);
00034 }
00035 
00036 void GlobalGoBackLabel::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent*)
00037 {
00038     emit goBack();
00039 }
